com.mysql.jdbc

Class Security

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mysql.jdbc.Security

  • public class Security
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods for doing secure authentication with MySQL-4.1 and newer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] scramble411(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String seed, java.lang.String passwordEncoding) 
      static void xorString(byte[] from, byte[] to, byte[] scramble, int length)
      Encrypt/Decrypt function used for password encryption in authentication Simple XOR is used here but it is OK as we crypt random strings

    • Method Detail

      • xorString

        public static void xorString(byte[] from,
             byte[] to,
             byte[] scramble,
             int length)
        Encrypt/Decrypt function used for password encryption in authentication Simple XOR is used here but it is OK as we crypt random strings
        Parameters:
        from - IN Data for encryption
        to - OUT Encrypt data to the buffer (may be the same)
        scramble - IN Scramble used for encryption
        length - IN Length of data to encrypt
